channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This architect wants to build cities out of lava

item.title: How Trump’s tariffs could leave the Fed at risk of triggering stagflation
item.description: Appeasing Trump would require the Fed to abandon its 2% inflation target. Pressure is mounting for that.

item.title: I held power of attorney for my late brother. Can I withdraw money from his bank account to give to his favorite charity?
item.description: ‘He honestly believed the power of attorney was also the beneficiary of this account, so a beneficiary was not listed’

item.title: How the federal government is tracking changes in the supply of street drugs

item.title: I begged my adviser to sell amid the market turmoil. He dragged his feet and I lost $20,000. Do I have any recourse?
item.description: “If he had moved my money out of the market weeks ago, much of my loss could have been prevented.”

item.description: President Donald Trump’s budget plan come reignite tumult in the U.S. bond market

item.title: Nvidia pledges to build its own factories in the U.S. for the first time to make AI supercomputers
item.description: Nvidia said it is working with its manufacturing partners to build factories that will produce AI supercomputers in the U.S.
